resources.string: For your assistance to use this App, please go through FAQ section. If you have any future querries or bug reporting, please feel free to mail us at

1) What is ADM?
 Ans: Absolute Download Manager

 2) How to set the number of parallel connections?
 Ans: Goto Mainpage -> Downloads, then select from the dropdown list.

 3) How to schedule a download?
 Ans: Goto Mainpage -> Scheduler, then set the time for scheduling. Then press the schedule button. Downloading automatically starts after the scheduling at the scheduled time

 4) How to check the list of files downloaded?
 Ans: Goto Mainpage -> log. There you will find the list of downloaded files.
